tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following methods was used to determine the 3D structure of hemoglobin?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Circular dichroism [dye-croh-ism]
X) X-ray crystallography
Y) Protein NMR
Z) Electrolysis
bonus_question: -   –  What common second messenger is released after epinephrine binds to liver GPCRs and was the subject of the 1994 Nobel Prize?
